name: bascnvimaeqv

body.origin:
|- wceq(cima(ccnv(cbs), universe), universe)
-| wfn(cbs, universe)
-| wi(wfn(cbs, universe), wceq(cima(ccnv(cbs), universe), universe))
body.pretty:
⊢ (`' Base " 𝕌)= 𝕌
⊣ Base[Fn]𝕌
⊣ (Base[Fn]𝕌 →(`' Base " 𝕌)= 𝕌)

-| wi(wfn(cbs, universe), wceq(cima(ccnv(cbs), universe), universe))
cumulated.pretty:

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cima(ccnv(cbs), universe), universe)
-| wi(wfn(cbs, universe), wceq(cima(ccnv(cbs), universe), universe))

comment: The inverse image of the universal class ` _V ` under the base function is the universal class ` _V ` itself. (Proposed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2020.) (Contributed by AV, 7-Mar-2020.)
